alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 7:32PM CDT until June 23 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... East central Crow Wing County in east central Minnesota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of Palisade, to near Cuyuna, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Aitkin, Palisade, Big Sandy Lake and Libby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
